blogs.title: Shingeki no kyogin
blogs.body:
An amazing seinen !! 

At first I didn't want to watch this anime because I was afraid of the blood etc. But I am glad that I started because everything works perfectly in this anime
blogs.author: Sully

blogs.title: Tokyo Revenger
blogs.body: I like this anime because I think the character are cute. My favourite is Mickey that at first was nice and then turns bad. But even if he his bad I still love him
